verses.name: Acts 15:32
verses.text: And Judas and Silas, being prophets also themselves, exhorted the brethren with many words, and confirmed them.

verses.name: Acts 15:33
verses.text: And after they had tarried there a space, they were let go in peace from the brethren unto the apostles.

verses.name: Acts 15:34
verses.text: Notwithstanding it pleased Silas to abide there still.

verses.name: Acts 15:35
verses.text: Paul also and Barnabas continued in Antioch, teaching and preaching the word of the Lord, with many others also.

verses.name: Acts 15:36
verses.text: And some days after Paul said unto Barnabas, Let us go again and visit our brethren in every city where we have preached the word of the Lord, and see how they do.
